mapper.insert: insert into tb_u3d_web_exp_record(experiment_id, park_browsing, smart_storage_browsing, device_awareness, order_processing, pick_by_order, pick_by_batch_order, pick_by_disperse, shipping_operation, sorting_operation, total_score, create_time, update_time,user_id,time) values (#{experimentId},#{parkBrowsing},#{smartStorageBrowsing},#{deviceAwareness},#{orderProcessing},#{pickByOrder}, #{pickByBatchOrder},#{pickByDisperse},#{shippingOperation},#{sortingOperation},#{totalScore},now(),now(),#{userId},#{time})
mapper.select: select id,experiment_id, park_browsing, smart_storage_browsing, device_awareness, order_processing, pick_by_order, pick_by_batch_order, pick_by_disperse, shipping_operation, sorting_operation, total_score, create_time, update_time,user_id from tb_u3d_web_exp_record where experiment_id=#{experimentId}
